items.title: Goldman says two plays on the senior housing boom can rally more than 20%. They also pay dividends
items.description: Goldman Sachs initiated coverage on two real estate investment trusts Friday.

items.title: Trump orders mortgage bond purchases to lower rates. These stocks are jumping in response
items.description: Analysts are now weighing the actual impact for consumers and what the move means for lending stocks.

items.title: Buy Amazon for a prospective breakout, says Carter Worth
items.description: From here, the chart analyst thinks owning Amazon will generate positive alpha.

items.title: History shows these stocks reporting earnings next week tend to beat expectations
items.description: Delta Air Lines and Bank of America are two companies reporting next week that have tended to beat Wall Street's expectations in the past.

items.title: Stars are aligning for Treasury yields to fall. This options trade hedges risk and makes money if rates dip
items.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this trade on the TLT ETF.
